column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The drinks are meh
column4: and there is a great dive bar called The Shamrock Club (which I recommend drinking at before and after you waste time and money at Bav's). The absolute worse thing about the experience is having to pay $10 for the right to spend $673.44 there. You are only allowed to make reservations on Resy
column6: and it isn't a deposit that goes toward your meal either. This is a load of mukarkey.
